summary: A command‑line utility that loads a HuggingFace checkpoint and its configuration, maps the weights to the corresponding NeMo text‑to‑image model architecture (e.g., Stable Diffusion or ControlNet), and saves the result as a NeMo .nemo checkpoint file.
business_intent: Enable users to migrate pretrained HuggingFace text‑to‑image models into the NeMo ecosystem for further training, fine‑tuning, or deployment with NeMo’s multimodal pipelines.
